reviewText: My daughter and I have been painting once a week with these DVDs, we haven't come close to finishing them but the ones we've painted have been easy to complete in 1 afternoon.  Great instructions.

This is a great dvd,featuring the very relaxing,calm, Bob Ross,and i mean that as a compliment,not only was he a great landscape artist,but also a great human being,who put,s you totally at ease, when viewing his show, also his love for animals is also showed in this dvd,i totally recommend this dvd.
